title: Most visited Smithsonian museums and institutions in the U.S. 2018
summary: This bar chart has 19 columns on the x axis representing Smithsonian Museums, and Number of visits in millions in each Smithsonian Museums on the y axis.
The Number of visits in millions is highest at Smithsonian Museums National Air and Space Museum's Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center and lowest at Smithsonian Museums S. Dillon Ripley Center.
The highest Smithsonian Museums National Air and Space Museum's Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center has 6.07 more Number of visits in millions than the lowest Smithsonian Museums S. Dillon Ripley Center.

The Number of visits in millions is appeared to be the highest at Smithsonian Museums National Air and Space Museum's Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center and lowest at Smithsonian Museums S. Dillon Ripley Center.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Smithsonian Museums in the x axis and Number of visits in millions in the y axis.
The Number of visits in millions is highest at Smithsonian Museums National Air and Space Museum's Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center and lowest at Smithsonian Museums S. Dillon Ripley Center.
The second highest Number of visits in millions is appeared to be the Smithsonian Museums National Air and Space Museum.
There is a difference of 6.07 between the maximum Smithsonian Museums National Air and Space Museum's Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center and minimum Smithsonian Museums S. Dillon Ripley Center.

The Smithsonian Museums National Air and Space Museum's Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center has the highest Number of visits in millions, followed by National Air and Space Museum, and National Museum of Natural History. Down to the Smithsonian Museums S. Dillon Ripley Center which is the lowest.
Smithsonian Museums National Air and Space Museum's Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center, and National Air and Space Museum have a similar Number of visits in millions that is 6.2.
The Smithsonian Museums National Air and Space Museum's Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center has 3.27 times more Number of visits in millions than average.
Summing up the values of all Smithsonian Museumss, we get total 36.01.
